name: Jet Ax
description:
Jet Ax is a project by student game developers at the Worcester Public Library. It is a platformer with 7 levels.

If you don't watch your step you could fall to your death.

The game is unique because of its bumpy texture and dark style.

Each of the levels is a unique, well thought out, experience for players.

What makes Jet Ax AWESOME:

  • Levels have personal flair
  • The levels still go together, even though they're unique
  • Parkour
  • Different techniques to get through levels
  • Different features
  • Secret hacks

This game was made with GameMaker Studio, Zack Bell's Action Platformer Engine #1, and the help of the Worcester Public Library.
